channel.title: Pi help with fences and all the moving stuff and making camolot in to pvp
channel.description:
Hey I was wandering if someone can help me with my problem witch is like
How can I remove fence camelot castle something like this (I riped the photo from some advertisement just to show what I mean)
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2jbsghy.jpg[/img]
And how can I move the teaving stalls like to different places? and like donator box and all the stuff to a new home? what file is it?
and 1 more thing how can I make the Castle part like safe zone and the out side of the castle all pvp?

item.title: Pi help with fences and all the moving stuff and making camolot in to pvp
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You can move npcs to a different coord by doing ::dataon I think it is it will give you the coords where your standing. Now go to the spawn-config file in data folder. You will see it has like npc = 2 blah blah.

The blah blah is where the coords are. Change that to whatever coords you want.

For moving objects keep the dataon on.

Now go to src->server->models-world -> objectmanager/handler I don’t remember which lol (probably manager ) and go down to customSpawns. you should see some stuff like (blah,blah,blah,blah,blah) change the coords in that to the new one.

Now to remove objects such as a wall etc you need go t the same area go to the coords of the object type in the coords into the customSpawn method then you instead of listing the object id in that array you would just put -1

Read full topic
item.source: Pi help with fences and all the moving stuff and making camolot in to pvp
